data: Respondents were asked if they had difficulty remembering or concentrating. Respondents who had "some" or "a lot" of difficulty or could not remember or concentrate at all were classified as having difficulty with remembering or concentrating.

caption: Percentage of difficulty remembering or concentrating  for adults aged 18 and over (95% confidence intervals), United States
caption3: Respondents were asked if they had difficulty remembering or concentrating. Respondents who had "some" or "a lot" of difficulty or could not remember or concentrate at all were classified as having difficulty with remembering or concentrating.
